generated_class_comment:
/**
 * The MedicationBeanValidator class is responsible for validating MedicationBean objects by checking the format of their ND Code and Description fields.
 * 
 * This class contains a method, validate(MedicationBean m), which performs the validation process. If the format of the ND Code or Description fields is incorrect, a FormValidationException is thrown.
 * 
 * Additionally, this class includes a default constructor, public MedicationBeanValidator(), which creates a new instance of MedicationBeanValidator without requiring any parameters.
 * 
 * Overall, the MedicationBeanValidator class ensures that MedicationBean objects adhere to the specified format requirements for their ND Code and Description fields.
 */
